text: @FLOTUS @WhiteHouse Thanks to your husband! No Wall can stop it, no travel restriction could stop it and no Republican lies could stop it-a tiny molecule,Coronavirus! 100,000+ Deaths expected! That’s more deaths than soldiers in Vietnam + Middle East! #EndTrumpVirus2020
